scripts.buildhb: cd handlebars && npm install && npm install --dev && node_modules/.bin/grunt && cd ..
scripts.disthb: rm -rf vendor/handlebars && mkdir -p vendor/handlebars && cd vendor/handlebars && cp -R ../../handlebars/dist . && cp -R ../../handlebars/lib . && cp -R ../../handlebars/bin . && cp ../../handlebars/package.json .
